Spectator Info

ALL Cross will be like an event inside an event or better put a party within a party. With local vibes and good times. Participate in various hand-ups to racers-yeah thatâ€™s right- we make it interesting with hand-ups such as donuts, bacon, money, and more. Spectators can be anyone at any age and do not have to know a rider or anything about cycling. That is the beauty of cyclocross. It is about having fun, being part of the community, and having fun (did we say having fun already?). Come join in with local vendors and party with us.
